acupoints.name: Shoulder Well
acupoints.location_hint: Highest point of shoulder muscle midpoint
acupoints.notes: Releases upper trapezius tension; avoid in pregnancy.

acupoints.name: Gates of Consciousness
acupoints.location_hint: Base of skull, hollows beside tendons

acupoints.name: Small Intestine 3
acupoints.location_hint: Ulnar side of hand, proximal to little finger MCP joint
acupoints.notes: Neck/upper back channel opener (paired with BL62).

acupoints.name: Waiguan
acupoints.location_hint: Dorsal forearm, ~2 cun above wrist crease between radius/ulna
acupoints.notes: Releases exterior, relieves lateral neck pain.

acupoints.name: Union Valley
acupoints.location_hint: Hand web between thumb and index finger
acupoints.notes: Adjunct for neck/shoulder tension; avoid in pregnancy.

disclaimer: For educational reference only. Not medical advice or a substitute for professional care.
